description: Try our easy to follow Quick Pork and Veggie Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried rice,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Low sugar,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Rice,Pork,Dairy free
name: Quick Pork and Veggie Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the pork in the honey, 1 tbs soy sauce and 1 tbs vegetable oil. Heat wok over high heat. Stir-fry pork until browned and mostly cooked, about 4 minutes. Set aside.
Add the cashews and garlic and stir-fry until the cashews colour and the garlic is fragrant. Remove from the wok.

Heat the remaining vegetable oil and add the frozen and fresh vegetables and remaining soy sauce. Cook for 3 minutes. Add the brown rice straight from the packet and stir through, cooking for a further 2 minutes.
Add the pork and cashews to the rice and vegetables and stir-fry for about 4 minutes or until the pork is fully cooked through. Test a piece to check as this can vary depending on thickness.
Stir in the white pepper immediately before serving.
